verbs.description: < p > President Trump [V: is] expected to announce on Tuesday he will allow sanctions to go forward on Iran , a first step toward withdrawing from the nuclear deal.</p >
< p > [ARG1: President Trump] is [V: expected] [C-ARG1: to announce on Tuesday he will allow sanctions to go forward on Iran , a first step toward withdrawing from the nuclear deal.</p] >

< p > [ARG0: President Trump] is expected to [V: announce] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG1: he will allow sanctions to go forward on Iran] , [ARGM-ADV: a first step toward withdrawing from the nuclear] deal.</p >
< p > President Trump is expected to announce on Tuesday he [V: will] allow sanctions to go forward on Iran , a first step toward withdrawing from the nuclear deal.</p >
< p > President Trump is expected to announce on Tuesday [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: allow] [ARG1: sanctions to go forward on Iran] , a first step toward withdrawing from the nuclear deal.</p >

< p > President Trump is expected to announce on Tuesday he will allow [ARG1: sanctions] to [V: go] [ARGM-DIR: forward] [ARGM-GOL: on Iran] , a first step toward withdrawing from the nuclear deal.</p >
< p > President Trump is expected to announce on Tuesday he will allow sanctions to go forward on Iran , a first step toward [V: withdrawing] [ARG2: from the nuclear] deal.</p >
